sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Civil and Equal Rights Enforcement Act.

sections.heading: There is created in the office of the Attorney General a
sections.text:
Division for the Enforcement of Civil and Equal Rights. The Division,
under the supervision and direction of the Attorney General, shall
investigate all violations of the laws relating to civil rights and the
prevention of discriminations against persons by reason of race, color,
creed, religion, sex, national origin, or physical or mental disability,
and shall, whenever such
violations are established, undertake necessary enforcement measures.
